Class Applicant

java.lang.Object
User
Applicant
Direct Known Subclasses:
Officer
public class Applicant extends User
Represents an applicant. This class stores information about the applicant's application status, eligibility(based on age and marital status), and project/flat selections.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    String
    applicationStatus
    Current application status of the applicant.

  • Field Details

    • applicationStatus

      public String applicationStatus
      Current application status of the applicant.

  • Constructor Details

    • Applicant

      public Applicant(String name, String userID, int age, String maritalStatus, String password)
      Constructs a new Applicant with personal and login details. Automatically checks and stores eligibility based on age and marital status.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the applicant
      userID - the unique user ID of the applicant
      age - the age of the applicant
      maritalStatus - the marital status of the applicant
      password - the password for login

  • Method Details

    • getEligibilityStatus

      public int getEligibilityStatus()
      Returns the eligibility status of the applicant.
      Returns:
      0 if not eligible, 1 if single and 35+, 2 if married and 21+

    • getApplicationStatus

      public String getApplicationStatus()
      returns the current application status
      Returns:
      the current application status

    • getAppliedFlatType

      public int getAppliedFlatType()
      returns the flat type applied for, by the applicant
      Returns:
      the flat type the applicant has applied for

    • getBookedFlatType

      public int getBookedFlatType()
      Returns the flat type the applicant has booked.
      Returns:
      the flat type that has been booked by the applicant

    • getProjApplied

      public TemplateProject getProjApplied()
      returns the applied project by the applicant
      Returns:
      the project, the applicant has applied to

    • hasBookedFlat

      public boolean hasBookedFlat()
      Checks whether the applicant has booked a flat.
      Returns:
      true if a flat has been booked, false otherwise

    • setApplicationStatus

      public void setApplicationStatus(String status)

      Parameters:

      public void setProjApplied(TemplateProject proj)
      Sets the project the applicant has applied to.
      Parameters:
      proj - the TemplateProject object

    • setBookedFlat

      public void setBookedFlat(boolean status)
      Sets the booked flat status.
      Parameters:
      status - true if the applicant has booked a flat, false otherwise
